Record.ClassificationPath: Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Pharmacologic Substance/Antineoplastic Agent/Angiogenesis Inhibitor/Endothelial Cell Inhibitor/PPI-2458
Record.BroaderTerm: Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Record.Description: A synthetic derivative of fumagillin with antineoplastic and cytotoxic properties. PPI-2458 irreversibly inhibits the enzyme methionine aminopeptidase type 2 (MetAP2), thereby preventing abnormal cell growth and angiogenesis. PPI-2458 is reported to have a better toxicity profile compared to other agents of its class. (NCI04)
